title: sobillu sapthaswara
sahitya:
shObhillu saptasvara sundarula bhajimpavE manasA

anupallavi

 nAbhi hrt-kaNTha rasana nAsadulu andu

caraNam

 dhara rksAmAdulalO vara gAyatri hrdayamuna 
sura bhUsura mAnasamuna shubha tyAgarAjuni eDa

ciTTai swaram
